excerpt: "Seema Gaur is the head of IT at one of the largest general insurance companies in India. She was honored in 2019 by IBM as a pioneer in putting AI to work in her business. Seema and her team are working to bring in the best technology to make the user journey more efficient, improve the agent experience,"
